mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rosecrans, William Starke to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rosecrans, William Starke
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Headquarters 1861. By Telegraph from Clarksburg 10 1861. [Aug 10?] Your letter of today was received accept my thanks I will enquire about those cavalry field officers & report to you the primary assistance I need is permission from the Government to employ drill masters & have a few Inspectors General. I think we shall be prepared for any force the enemy is likely to bring against us accepting you offer shall call upon you freely. W.S. Rosecrans Brig Genl USA 59D202pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rosecrans, William Starke
Clarksburg, (West) Virginia
Headquarters
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
